```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(plotly)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
data <- read_excel("C:/Users/earls/OneDrive/Documents/RProjects/MyProjects/OctWork/Rig tests/Data/Block B1 Cycle 6 Desorption.xlsx", sheet=1)

```

```{r}
data %>% View()
```

```{r}
class(data)
str(data)
```

```{r}
data1 <- data %>%
  mutate(mins = timeSeconds/(1000*60)) %>%
  select(CO2Perc, O2Perc, mins)
```
```{r}
View(data1)
```

```{r}

```

```{r}
names(data1)
str(data1)
```


```{r}
p <- ggplot(data1, aes(mins, CO2Perc))+
  geom_smooth()+
  ggtitle("Desorption Test on Monoliths")+
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 16, face = "bold", hjust = 0.5)
  )
```


## Convert graph to an interactive plotly graph
``` {r}
p1 <- ggplotly(p)

p1
```
